subject: Fwd: Information
body:
These wretched musings were interrupted by a 
harsh, half-superstitious gasp from Hezekiah. "When he saw us, he started to 
cry,he said, and finally added: "He kept calling me David. He huddled by the 
occasional table, shivering all over, staring at them with rolling eyes. "she 
persisted, and he saw with alarm that the narrow look was growing blacker and 
blacker.Immediately his mind lit up 
with panicky floodlights and his skin flushed with his terror. These wretched 
musings were interrupted by a harsh, half-superstitious gasp from 
Hezekiah.
